issue.title: [C++] Add option to disable PIC
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16886](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16886). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently `CMAKE_POSITION_INDEPENEDNT_CODE` is always set to `ON` in cmake.  In some use cases we want to build non-PIC static lib for performance reason, it would be nice to have an option to disable PIC in the build.
